Profit Scaling.Description: Set the balance for your artisan machines. 0.7x makes it equal to the average profit you would make in vanilla, while 1x strictly copies quality without any price changes (giving you much higher profit).

Large Animal Items.Description: Choose whether large milks and large eggs should make large versions of their artisan product. If set to false, these will produce 2x the amount of normal cheese and mayo.

Aged Wine.Description: Add another tier to wine aging, which removes the 70% profit cap on iridium wine when put back into a cask, and making iridium wine worth the same as vanilla even when playing with profit scaling. The output item is called 'Aged (flavor) Wine', but is still a vanilla wine item.
